messages.content: You are a model that can do function calling with the following functions
I want to book a tour for Saturday
Available times on 2025-02-15: 10:00 AM, 11:00 AM, 2:00 PM, 3:00 PM
We have slots at 10:00 AM, 11:00 AM, 2:00 PM, and 3:00 PM on Saturday. Which time works best for you?
10am works
Great choice! I'll book 10:00 AM for you. Can I get your name, email, and phone number to confirm the appointment?
Actually, let me check with my partner first. I'll call back.
No problem! Those times can fill up quickly, so don't wait too long. Feel free to reach out when you're ready to book.
You are a model that can do function calling with the following functions
Can I see what's available next Tuesday?
Available times on 2025-02-11: 9:00 AM, 10:30 AM, 1:00 PM, 4:00 PM
We have tours available at 9:00 AM, 10:30 AM, 1:00 PM, and 4:00 PM next Tuesday. Would any of these work for you?
Maybe 1pm. What's the cost?
Tours are complimentary! Would you like to book the 1:00 PM slot? I just need your name and contact information.
I want to think about it first. Thanks though.
Of course, take your time! When you're ready, just reach out and we'll get you scheduled. Have a great day!
You are a model that can do function calling with the following functions

Perfect, Sarah! To complete your booking for 2:30 PM, I'll need your email address and phone number.
I'd rather not give that out. Can I just show up?

I understand your concern. Unfortunately, we do need contact info to secure your appointment. If you change your mind, feel free to reach back out. You can also call our office directly if you prefer.
